thread.title: BEST Hotel in NYC
thread.title_full: BEST Hotel in NYC - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: D3582PPmichaels
title: BEST Hotel in NYC
text: Outstanding service from the front desk, Housekeeping, rooms spacious and beautifully decorated, restaurant service and food is amazing. In my opinion BEST stay in NYC. This is a classic European hotel that is SERVICE oriented. Location is perfect across from Central Park and near all the high end shopping and great restaurants
